1:
mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: "${SECRET_DOUBLE_TAKE_MQTT_USER}"
  password: "${SECRET_DOUBLE_TAKE_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - amcrest-frontyard
    - amcrest-pool
    - amcrest-turret
    - amcrest-office

  zones:
    - camera: amcrest-frontyard
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-pool
      zone: outside
    - camera: amcrest-turret
      zone: familyroom
    - camera: amcrest-office
      zone: office

  events:

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"
  compreface:
    enabled: false

time:
  timezone: America/New_York

notify:

0:
[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

server_url: https://${APP_DNS_HEADSCALE}:443
listen_addr: 0.0.0.0:8080
metrics_listen_addr: 0.0.0.0:9090
grpc_listen_addr: 127.0.0.1:50443
grpc_allow_insecure: false
private_key_path: /etc/headscale/private.key
noise:
  private_key_path: /etc/headscale/noise_private.key
db_type: postgres
db_host: pg-default-rw.pg.svc.cluster.local.
db_port: 5432
db_name: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_DBNAME}
db_user: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_USER}
db_pass: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_PASS}
db_ssl: true
tls_cert_path: "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key_path: "/tls/privkey.pem"
log:
  format: json
  level: info
logtail:
  enabled: false
#acl_policy_path: "/etc/headscale/acl.hujson"
ip_prefixes:
  - ${CONFIG_HEADSCALE_IPV4}
randomize_client_port: false
dns_config:
  magic_dns: true
  base_domain: ${DNS_SHORT}
  override_local_dns: true
  nameservers:
    - ${IP_HOME_DNS}
  domains:
    - ${DNS_SHORT}
derp:
  server:
    enabled: true
    region_id: 999
    region_code: "Biohazard"
    region_name: "Biohazard-Home-Relay"
    stun_listen_addr: "0.0.0.0:3478"
  urls:
    - https://controlplane.tailscale.com/derpmap/default
  paths: []
  auto_update_enabled: true
  update_frequency: 24h
disable_check_updates: true
ephemeral_node_inactivity_timeout: 30m
node_update_check_interval: 10s
oidc:
  only_start_if_oidc_is_available: true
  issuer: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_URL}"
  client_id: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_ID}"
  client_secret: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_SECRET}"
  scope: ["openid", "profile", "email"]
  expiry: 30d
  use_expiry_from_token: false
  extra_params:
    domain_hint: ${DNS_MAIN}
  allowed_domains:
    - ${APP_DNS_AUTH}
    - ${DNS_MAIN}
Welcome to the home of Tinfoil Hat Sensei.

<include file="/inspircd/conf/server.conf">
<include file="/inspircd/conf/opers.conf">
<include file="/inspircd/conf/links.conf">
<include file="/inspircd/conf/cloak.conf">

<server
    name="&servername;"
    description="&serverdesc;"
    network="cni">

<admin
    name="&opername;"
    nickname="&opername;"
    description="&operdesc;"
    email="&opermail;">

<gnutls onrehash="yes">
<sslprofile name="certmanager"
    provider="gnutls"
    cafile=""
    certfile="/inspircd/tls/tls.crt"
    crlfile=""
    dhfile=""
    hash="sha256"
    keyfile="/inspircd/tls/tls.key"
    mindhbits="1024"
    outrecsize="2048"
    priority="SECURE256:-CIPHER-ALL:+AES-256-GCM:+CHACHA20-POLY1305:-KX-ALL:+ECDHE-RSA:+ECDHE-ECDSA:-COMP-ALL:-VERS-ALL:+VERS-TLS1.2:+VERS-TLS1.3:-GROUP-ALL:+GROUP-SECP521R1:+GROUP-X25519:+GROUP-X448"
    requestclientcert="no"
    strictpriority="yes">

<bind
    address="0.0.0.0"
    port="6697"
    type="clients"
    sslprofile="certmanager"
    defer="0"
    free="no">

<bind address="" port="6667" type="clients">

<connect deny="3ffe::0/32" reason="The 6bone address space is deprecated">

<connect
    name="main"
    allow="*"
    maxchans="1000"
    timeout="20"
    pingfreq="2m"
    hardsendq="1M"
    softsendq="10240"
    recvq="10K"
    threshold="10"
    commandrate="1000"
    fakelag="yes"
    localmax="3"
    globalmax="3"
    resolvehostnames="yes"
    useident="no"
    limit="5000"
    modes="+x">

<files motd="/inspircd/conf/motd.txt">

<maxlist chan="*" limit="100">

<options
    prefixquit="Quit: "
    suffixquit=""
    prefixpart="""
    suffixpart="""
    syntaxhints="no"
    cyclehostsfromuser="no"
    announcets="yes"
    allowmismatch="no"
    defaultbind="auto"
    hostintopic="no"
    pingwarning="15"
    serverpingfreq="1m"
    splitwhois="no"
    defaultmodes="not"
    xlinemessage="Feel the wrath of the almighty Thor!"
    modesinlist="no"
    extbanformat="name"
    exemptchanops="filter:o nickflood:o nonick:v regmoderated:o"
    invitebypassmodes="yes"
    nosnoticestack="no">

<performance
    netbuffersize="10240"
    somaxconn="128"
    softlimit="12800"
    clonesonconnect="yes"
    timeskipwarn="2s"
    quietbursts="yes">

<security
    announceinvites="dynamic"
    hideservices="no"
    flatlinks="no"
    hideservicekills="yes"
    hidesplits="no"
    maxtargets="20"
    restrictbannedusers="yes"
    genericoper="no"
    userstats="Pu">

<limits
    maxaway="200"
    maxchan="60"
    maxhost="64"
    maxident="10"
    maxkey="30"
    maxkick="300"
    maxmodes="20"
    maxnick="30"
    maxquit="300"
    maxreal="130"
    maxtopic="330">

# method="stdout" doesn't log properly
<log method="file"
    target="/dev/stdout"
    level="debug"
    type="* -USERINPUT -USEROUTPUT">

<whowas
    groupsize="10"
    maxgroups="100000"
    maxkeep="3d">

<badhost host="root@*" reason="Don't IRC as root!">

<insane
    hostmasks="no"
    ipmasks="no"
    nickmasks="no"
    trigger="20">

<bind address="0.0.0.0"
    port="7001"
    type="servers"
    sslprofile="certmanager">

<hostname charmap="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ.-_/0123456789">

<module name="alias">
<module name="bcrypt">
<module name="cap">
<module name="chghost">
<module name="chgident">
<module name="chgname">
<module name="conn_umodes">
<module name="hidechans">
<module name="operchans">
<module name="password_hash">
<module name="services_account">
<module name="spanningtree">
<module name="ssl_gnutls">
<module name="svshold">
<mkpasswd operonly="no">
<bcrypt rounds="10">

<class
    name="Shutdown"
    commands="DIE RESTART REHASH LOADMODULE UNLOADMODULE RELOADMODULE GLOADMODULE GUNLOADMODULE GRELOADMODULE"
    privs="users/auspex channels/auspex servers/auspex users/mass-message users/flood/no-throttle users/flood/increased-buffers"
    usermodes="*"
    chanmodes="*"
    snomasks="*">

<class name="SACommands" commands="SAJOIN SAPART SANICK SAQUIT SATOPIC SAKICK SAMODE OJOIN">
<class name="ServerLink" commands="CONNECT SQUIT RCONNECT RSQUIT MKPASSWD ALLTIME SWHOIS" usermodes="*" chanmodes="*" privs="servers/auspex" snomasks="Cc">
<class name="BanControl" commands="KILL GLINE KLINE ZLINE QLINE ELINE TLINE RLINE CHECK NICKLOCK NICKUNLOCK SHUN CBAN" usermodes="*" chanmodes="*" snomasks="Xx">
<class name="OperChat" commands="WALLOPS GLOBOPS" usermodes="*" chanmodes="*" privs="users/mass-message" snomasks="Gg">
<class name="HostCloak" commands="SETHOST SETIDENT SETIDLE CHGNAME CHGHOST CHGIDENT" usermodes="*" chanmodes="*" privs="users/auspex">

<type
    name="NetAdmin"
    classes="SACommands OperChat BanControl HostCloak Shutdown ServerLink"
    vhost="netadmin.&servername;"
    maxchans="1000"
    modes="+s +cCqQ">

<oper
    name="&opername;"
    hash="bcrypt"
    password="&operhash;"
    host="100.10*.*.*"
    type="NetAdmin">

domain = "${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
origin = "https://${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
tls_chain = "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key = "/tls/privkey.pem"
role = "WriteReplica"
log_level = "verbose"
bindaddress = "[::]:8443"
ldapbindaddress = "[::]:3636"
trust_x_forward_for = true
db_path = "/data/kanidm.db"
db_fs_type = "other"
[online_backup]
path = "/backup/"
schedule = "0 0 22 * * * *"
versions = 7

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>

<Server version="8">
  <Name>${CONFIG_OVENMEDIAENGINE_NAME}</Name>
  <Type>origin</Type>
  <IP>*</IP>
  <PrivacyProtection>false</PrivacyProtection>
  <StunServer>stun.l.google.com:19302</StunServer>

  <Modules>
    <HTTP2>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </HTTP2>
    <LLHLS>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </LLHLS>
    <P2P>
      <!-- disabled by default, experimental -->
      <Enable>true</Enable>
      <MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>2</MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>
    </P2P>
  </Modules>

  <Bind>
    <Providers>
      <RTSPC>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTSPC>
      <OVT>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <RTMP>
        <Port>$${env:OME_RTMP_PROV_PORT:1935}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTMP>
      <SRT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_SRT_PROV_PORT:9999}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </SRT>
      <MPEGTS>
        <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
      </MPEGTS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Providers>

    <Publishers>
      <OVT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_ORIGIN_PORT:9000}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <LLHLS>
        <TLSPort>$${env:OME_LLHLS_STREAM_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </LLHLS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Publishers>
  </Bind>

  <VirtualHosts>
    <VirtualHost include="VHost*.xml" />
    <VirtualHost>
      <Name>default</Name>
      <Distribution>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Distribution>

      <Host>
        <Names>
          <Name>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
          <Name>${APP_IP_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
        </Names>
        <TLS>
          <CertPath>/tls/server.pem</CertPath>
          <KeyPath>/ssl/tls.key</KeyPath>
          <ChainCertPath>/tls/ca.pem</ChainCertPath>
        </TLS>
      </Host>

      <CrossDomains>
        <Url>*</Url>
      </CrossDomains>

      <Applications>
        <Application>
          <Name>app</Name>
          <Type>live</Type>
          <OutputProfiles>
            <HardwareAcceleration>false</HardwareAcceleration>
            <OutputProfile>
              <Name>stream</Name>
              <OutputStreamName>$${OriginStreamName}</OutputStreamName>

              <Playlist>
                <Name>watch</Name>
                <FileName>watch</FileName>
                <Options>
                  <WebRtcAutoAbr>true</WebRtcAutoAbr>
                </Options>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>direct</Name>
                  <Video>bypass_video</Video>
                  <Audio>bypass_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
              </Playlist>

              <Encodes>
                <Video>
                  <Name>bypass_video</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Video>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>bypass_audio</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>aac_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>aac</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>opus_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>opus</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
              </Encodes>
            </OutputProfile>
          </OutputProfiles>
          <Providers>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </WebRTC>
            <RTMP />
            <SRT />
            <RTSPPull />
            <MPEGTS>
              <StreamMap>
                  <Stream>
                    <Name>stream_$${Port}</Name>
                    <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
                  </Stream>
              </StreamMap>
            </MPEGTS>
          </Providers>
          <Publishers>
            <AppWorkerCount>1</AppWorkerCount>
            <StreamWorkerCount>8</StreamWorkerCount>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <Rtx>false</Rtx>
              <Ulpfec>false</Ulpfec>
              <JitterBuffer>false</JitterBuffer>
            </WebRTC>
            <LLHLS>
              <OriginMode>true</OriginMode>
              <ChunkDuration>0.5</ChunkDuration>
              <!-- PartHoldBack SHOULD be at least three times the Part Target Duration -->
              <PartHoldBack>1.5</PartHoldBack>
              <SegmentDuration>6</SegmentDuration>
              <SegmentCount>10</SegmentCount>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </LLHLS>
          </Publishers>
        </Application>
      </Applications>
    </VirtualHost>
  </VirtualHosts>
</Server>

awk -v cert_num=0 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/server.pem && awk -v cert_num=1 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/ca.pem && awk -v cert_num=2 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt >> /tls/ca.pem
